list_translation_mean.translate_mean: cây dù để nhảy từ phi cơ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a cloth canopy which fills with air and allows a person or heavy object attached to it to descend slowly when dropped from an aircraft, or which is released from the rear of an aircraft on landing to act as a brake.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the savior of many pilots has been the parachute
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: vị cứu tinh của nhiều phi công là chiếc dù

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: drop or cause to drop from an aircraft by parachute.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: airborne units parachuted in to secure the airport
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đơn vị trên không bỏ qua để bảo đảm sân bay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: appoint or be appointed in an emergency or from outside the existing hierarchy.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an old crony of the CEO was controversially parachuted into the job
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một anh thảo cũ của CEO đã gây tranh cãi trong công việc
